titleStmt.title: Licia, or Poemes of loue in honour of the admirable and singular vertues of his lady, to the imitation of the best Latin poets, and others. Whereunto is added the rising to the crowne of Richard the third.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Giles, 1549?-1611.

titleStmt.title: Licia, or Poemes of loue in honour of the admirable and singular vertues of his lady, to the imitation of the best Latin poets, and others. Whereunto is added the rising to the crowne of Richard the third.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Giles, 1549?-1611.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; the dedication and "To the reader" are respectively dated 4 Sept and 8 Sept. 1593.
"The rising to the crowne of Richard the third. VVritten by him selfe [i.e. Giles Fletcher]" has divisional title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
